name: Lovingme: Dating new friends by video & voice chat
description: A new lit version is coming, join us to make dating easier!  Lovingme is a new dating App that connects you with beautiful girls and handsome boys from the whole world to chat online via video & voice call. You can check their personal profile, moments, photos when you find the person you like and want to have relationship with. Then you can send him/her message, gift, or have voice call or video call in real-time. You can find who you want to date no mater in daily life, or online game, etc.    In general, lovingme is an App that help you find your girlfriend or boyfriend easily, record and share you daily wonderful moments, chat with people you like by watching a bunch of videos, talk with people with any topics, show off your talents etc.    Main Features:   [Beautify feature] Look prettier on Lovingme. Once your face is recognized during video chat, beauty effect will be applied automatically.   [Moments news] Easily record and share the mood and wonderful moments, meet a variety of talent and good-looking people, from now on life will be more wonderful and warm.   [Dating feature] Easily find the people you like and make friends, and you can have voice call or video call with them.   [Wonderful video] Full of videos of beauties and cool guys. You can like and chat with people you like just by swiping.    If you like making friends, chatting, dating, no matter if you are single or not , welcome to join in lovingme to make friends via video chat and voice call chat!!! Any porn chat or fraud is prohibited. If you have any questions, please send an email to lovemelee802@gmail.com   Any questions and feedback are welcome!
